email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a vessel available for your steel coils shipment from Shanghai to Long Beach.

Details:
- Commodity: Steel Coils
- Quantity: 12,000 MT
- Load Port: Shanghai
- Discharge Port: Long Beach
- Incoterm: CIF
- Vessel: PACIFIC TRADER
- Freight Offer: USD 85/MT
- Laycan: 20-25 Oct 2023

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you adjust the freight to USD 80/MT? Also, could you provide the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. I can adjust the freight to USD 82/MT. The vessel PACIFIC TRADER has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 250m. The laycan remains 20-25 Oct 2023.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

USD 82/MT is acceptable. Can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach - Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The demurrage rate is USD 6,000 per day, pro rata. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach - Demurrage Rate
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The demurrage rate is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
